overview: A young man (Tone) finds a way off the streets when he is introduced to Chicago Style Stepping, his best friend (Dre) on the other hand cannot shake that street mentality. Tone has to make the difficult choice between his friend and his passion for dancing.
tagline: A young man (Tone) finds a way off the streets when he is introduced to Chicago Style Stepping, his best friend (Dre) on the other hand cannot shake that street mentality. Tone has to make the difficult choice between his friend and his passion for dancing.
title: Step Off The Block
